subject: Art & Design
title: Trust Signals: Why Users Believe You
description: One-minute skill: Trust Signals: Why Users Believe You.

hook.text: You land on a website. No SSL padlock, stock photos, and a 'Best Company 2024' badge from a site that doesn't exist.

buildup.text: Trust signals are design elements that communicate legitimacy: SSL certificates, real photos, testimonials, brand logos.

discovery.text: Professional typography, consistent branding, and fast load times all unconsciously signal competence and reliability.

twist.text: Scammers mimic trust signals perfectly. Users must look beyond surface signals ‚Äî but most don't.

climax.text: Shopify stores with customer reviews convert 270% more than stores without.

punchline.text: Trust isn't declared. It's demonstrated through a thousand small design.

quiz.question: Why do customer reviews significantly boost conversions?
options: They serve as authentic social proof that builds trust
Search engines require reviews for ranking
